```{r}
library(rvest)

BLS_EP_URL <- read_html("https://www.bls.gov/emp/tables/occupational-projections-and-characteristics.htm")

OccProjTbl <- html_nodes(BLS_EP_URL, "table")
head(tbls)

OccProjTbl <- BLS_EP_URL %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  .[2] %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

str(OccProjTbl)
```
